verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> of degrees <WH4609>. In my distress <WH6869> I cried <WH7121> unto the LORD <WH3068>, and he heard <WH6030> me.
Deliver <WH5337> my soul <WH5315>, O LORD <WH3068>, from lying <WH8267> lips <WH8193>, and from a deceitful <WH7423> tongue <WH3956>.
What shall be given <WH5414> unto thee? or what shall be done <WH3254> unto thee, thou false <WH7423> tongue <WH3956>?
Sharp <WH8150> arrows <WH2671> of the mighty <WH1368>, with coals <WH1513> of juniper <WH7574>.
Woe <WH190> is me, that I sojourn <WH1481> in Mesech <WH4902>, that I dwell <WH7931> in the tents <WH168> of Kedar <WH6938>!
My soul <WH5315> hath long <WH7227> dwelt <WH7931> with him that hateth <WH8130> peace <WH7965>.
I am for peace <WH7965>: but when I speak <WH1696>, they are for war <WH4421>.
